meanings.definition: A group of people who have a common purpose or goal.
meanings.sent1: My posse and I are working together on a school project.
meanings.sent2: The posse of friends gathered to celebrate a birthday.
meanings.sent3: The posse of classmates decided to organize a charity event.
meanings.sent4: Her posse of supporters stood by her side through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The posse of volunteers made a significant impact on the community.

meanings.definition: A group of police officers or other officials.
meanings.sent1: The sheriff's posse quickly responded to the emergency call.
meanings.sent2: The posse arrived at the scene to maintain order during the protest.
meanings.sent3: The posse of officers patrolled the neighborhood on bicycles.
meanings.sent4: The posse of detectives solved the case in record time.
meanings.sent5: The posse of security guards ensured the event ran smoothly.
